about.p2: I am a hungarian illustrator and motion designer living in Pécs.
about.p3: While I like creating amusing works, it is also very important to me to bring other’s ideas to life in the best possible way.
about.p4: My two main interests beside creating images and animation are the world of skateboarding and music. I would be more than willing to work on projects related to them, if I get an opportunity.
about.p5: Feel free to contact me with ideas, I’m always interested in working on different projects  :)
